html.p: You spend some fruitless minutes in a warehouse packed with crates, boxes, and sacks; there are several doors and exits, and your man has disappeared. Worse still, when you get back to the Endimion the Dark Elf is dead. The ship's captain tells you that he spoke only a few words before he died: 'Go north-north-west along the Stormdrake Pass.' Now, will you:

td.a: Buy some extra equipment or food?
Buy some extra equipment or food?
